CustomField.formula: IF( CONTAINS(TEXT(Extension_Type_AMS__c) ,'AMS Extension'),'Please select this option when as part of AMS extension we have to extend existing AMS with a redundancy scheme',IF(ProductAttributeValueId__r.Apttus_Config2__LineItemId__r.Apttus_Config2__ProductId__r.ProductCode == "MPW",'If no Geo Redundancy is selected, the solution will come with one system (equiped with two servers = redundant) deployed at one site. If Geo Redundancy is selected, the solution will come with two systems (each with two servers = redundant) deployed on two different sites.',NULL))
CustomField.label: Guidance
